title: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Krynky, Tyahynka, Ivanivka, Novoberyslav and Kherson city of Kherson region, - Gene...
content: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Krynky, Tyahynka, Ivanivka, Novoberyslav and Kherson city of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
